summary: Tested desktop search page at /search route. The page renders correctly with sidebar + main content layout, search functionality works, trending searches display, and category navigation redirects properly. However, the redesigned horizontal card layout from /app/frontend/app/(tabs)/search.tsx is NOT being used - the route /search uses /app/frontend/app/search.tsx which has a different simpler layout.

integration_issues.issue: The /search route uses /app/frontend/app/search.tsx instead of the redesigned /app/frontend/app/(tabs)/search.tsx. The tabs version has the new horizontal card layout with image-left-text-right design, Filters button, and Sort dropdown, but it's not being served at the /search URL.

issues: Result cards display without images (gray placeholders visible)
Missing Filters and Sort buttons that were specified in requirements

desktop_layout.details: Desktop viewport (1920x1080) renders correctly with sidebar + main content layout

search_bar_visible.details: Search input with 'Search for anything...' placeholder and green Search button visible in main content area

search_stats_sidebar.details: Sidebar shows 'Search Stats' section with TRENDING searches (laptop, iph, test, etc.) and counts

search_functionality.details: Search works - entering 'test' returns '20 results for test' with listing cards displayed

category_navigation.details: Clicking Electronics category in sidebar redirects to /category/electronics

filter_functionality.details: Filters button not present in current search page implementation (exists in tabs version but not in app/search.tsx)

sort_functionality.details: Sort dropdown not present in current search page implementation (exists in tabs version but not in app/search.tsx)

horizontal_card_layout.details: The redesigned horizontal card layout (image-left, text-right) from (tabs)/search.tsx is not being used. Current layout shows simpler two-column grid of cards.
